snippet.title: Endorlight - Steam Greenlight
snippet.description:
Endorlight is Rogue-like game in which you have to find a way out to the next level. 
Most importantly - you need to survive. There is no "Repeat". When you die, you have to start from the beginning. 
Each level contains a new and tougher enemies. Every 15 levels you'll have to face the Boss. Ruthless and big monster. Used your bow or whip to defeat him! 
So...do you think you can finish 100 levels?
